Articles.Content: It has affected me too.
July 2011 guy here... Bittervet pride i suppose ;D
All the shiny new newbies. lol! I swear, every time I leave this forum for a break, something crazy happens!
On no! I wanted to do a campaign, but the forum post isn't there anymore.

My account was reset to October 2012, so basically everything I've done since then is wiped. Dissapointing sure, but all you can do is pick up the pieces and start again. These things happen. I doubt people will stay away permanently, and I dare say after this last disaster, Damion or someone else will be more vigilant in backing up the forum data on a more regular basis. It's hard to see how nearly 6 months of data was corrupted.
I made one a while back but didn't really use it, so it has not effected me as much as other people.
Whelp, this is post two... again. LOL! Glad to see the forum back. I missed it so.

Methinks I stay away from the forums tomorrow, once the word gets out it is going to go ballistic around here, the mods and admins won't know which way to turn...

Good luck guys, you gonna need it once the word gets out..

All the shiny new newbies. lol! I swear, every time I leave this forum for a break, something crazy happens!

So then this is your fault? GET HIM GUYS!

Yes. =[

im new
Yep, Yep, Yep. Sadly, mine did. :/
good thing i really didnt post much before hand...
Yup, I had to start from scratch, but other than having to spend time to set up my profile again I'm not bothered.

Yup, lost mine. Though I've only been around since the end of March, so I hadn't gotten much wiped anyway.

P.S. Is my avatar visible and working? For me I see the error '?' mark.

Edited April 19, 2013 by DannySwish
I don't THINK so... haven't actually posted much recently though, so nothing of value from me was lost.

Yup, lost mine. Though I've only been around since the end of March, so I hadn't gotten much wiped anyway.

P.S. Is my avatar visible and working? For me I see the error '?' mark.

Nope can't see your avatar.

Yup, lost mine. Though I've only been around since the end of March, so I hadn't gotten much wiped anyway.

Yeah, I got here on March 9. I think I only lost my "Welcome Aboard" posts, and maybe an image of my first orbital docking.

I don't think it got deleted, I just never got a confirmation email. Just gave up and made a new account.

EDIT: Probably did get deleted...

Edited April 19, 2013 by FormallyFredonia
My account got deleted... shame.
Mine was deleted, but it's no big deal. I'm back in action.
There will be a lot of people joined on April 2013
Yeah my account got deleted too. Unfortunately I have to go through the entire approval process again, so my posts will come out slow

I survived... just...

150-odd of my posts have been annihilated, and the story I was writing is gone

But I do consider myself lucky to have my account, can't have been much before October that I made it, because it wasn't much before October that I bought 0.16. Hmm.
I Lost my friends and my atmos military aircraft thread =( massive sad face.

I've lost everything. Luckily I didn't have anything like stories posted.

But it's a bummer that I've got to start from scratch.

Note to mods, backup the forum every month so that people that have put a lot of work into writing stories etc don't loose everything.

Roland
